meanings.sent1: The cake was superterrific, everyone loved it!
meanings.sent2: The superterrific movie received rave reviews from critics.
meanings.sent3: The superterrific sunset painted the sky in beautiful colors.
meanings.sent4: Her superterrific talent shone brightly on stage.
meanings.sent5: The superterrific fireworks lit up the night sky with brilliance.

meanings.sent1: She superterrifically excelled in her exams.
meanings.sent2: The team superterrifically outperformed their opponents.
meanings.sent3: He superterrifically sprinted to the finish line in record time.
meanings.sent4: The car superterrifically sped down the highway.
meanings.sent5: The flowers superterrifically bloomed in the spring sunshine.

meanings.definition: Used to express enthusiasm or approval.
meanings.sent4: Superterrific! Your hard work paid off!
